required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Contour 3D®/TriAd® Tricuspid Annuloplasty Ring Post-Market Clinical Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Contour 3D®/TriAd® Tricuspid Annuloplasty Ring Post-Market Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to gather clinical information on the hemodynamic performance of the Contour 3D® and Tri-Ad® Tricuspid Annuloplasty Rings in a post-market environment.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary goal of the TV repair procedure is to relieve patients from TV insufficiency or reduce TV stenosis. This study will evaluate the hemodynamic efficacy of the Contour 3D® and Tri-Ad® ring and characterize the effect of the TV repair through assessment of right atrial size and right ventricular function. Additionally, this study will characterize the patient population for whom a Contour 3D® or Tri-Ad® ring is chosen to repair TV insufficiency. Health status and adverse events (AE) will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the Degree of Tricuspid Regurgitation
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment. Degree of TV regurgitation - Change in the degree of tricuspid regurgitation from preimplant through 12 months postimplant.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the Degree of Tricuspid Regurgitation
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment. Degree of TV regurgitation - Change in the degree of tricuspid regurgitation from preimplant through 12 months postimplant.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the Degree of Tricuspid Regurgitation
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment. Degree of TV regurgitation - Change in the degree of tricuspid regurgitation from preimplant through 12 months postimplant.

primary_outcome.measure: The Mean Gradient Across the Tricuspid Valve
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment by analysis of the mean gradient across the tricuspid valve. The mean gradient across the tricuspid valve measured at discharge, 6 months, and 12 months post-implant

primary_outcome.measure: The Mean Gradient Across the Tricuspid Valve
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment by analysis of the mean gradient across the tricuspid valve. secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Right Ventricle (RV) Diastolic Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area at end diastole. Change in the Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area from preimplant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Right Ventricle (RV) Diastolic Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area at end diastole. Change in the Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area from preimplant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Right Ventricle (RV) Diastolic Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area at end diastole. Change in the Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area from preimplant through 12 months post-implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Tricuspid Annular (Basal) Diameter
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Tricuspid annular (basal) diameter. Change in the tricuspid annular (basal) diameter from preimplant through 12 months post-implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Tricuspid Annular (Basal) Diameter
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Tricuspid annular (basal) diameter. Change in the tricuspid annular (basal) diameter from preimplant through 12 months post-implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Tricuspid Annular (Basal) Diameter
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Tricuspid annular (basal) diameter. Change in the tricuspid annular (basal) diameter from preimplant through 12 months post-implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the RV Fractional Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on RV fractional area. Change in the RV fractional area preimplant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the RV Fractional Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on RV fractional area. Change in the RV fractional area preimplant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the RV Fractional Area
secondary_outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on RV fractional area. Change in the RV fractional area preimplant through 12 months post-implant.
Characterize the patient population for which an annuloplasty ring is chosen to repair TV insufficiency and assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in New York Heart Association (NYHA) Classification
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status by analysis of the New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification from pre-implant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in New York Heart Association (NYHA) Classification
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status by analysis of the New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification from pre-implant through 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in New York Heart Association (NYHA) Classification .
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status by analysis of the New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification from pre-implant through 12 months post-implant.

arm_group.description: The subject population includes patients indicated for a TV repair procedure concomitant to left-sided heart surgery, and for whom the surgeon considers the implantation of a Contour 3D® ring most appropriate to reconstruct the diseased valve. Patients with primary TV regurgitation will not be included in this study. Implantation with the Contour 3D® ring will occur in conjunction with another concomitant surgical repair procedure

The subject population includes patients indicated for a TV repair procedure concomitant to left-sided heart surgery, and for whom the surgeon considers the implantation of a Tri-Ad® ring most appropriate to reconstruct the diseased valve. Patients with primary TV regurgitation will not be included in this study. Implantation with the Tri-Ad® ring will occur in conjunction with another concomitant surgical repair procedure

intervention.intervention_name: Contour 3D® implant for tricuspid valve repair
Tri-Ad® implant for tricuspid valve repair

study_pop.textblock: The subject population includes patients indicated for a TV repair procedure concomitant to left-sided heart surgery, and for whom the surgeon considers the implantation of a Contour 3D® or Tri-Ad® ring most appropriate to reconstruct the diseased valve. Patients with primary TV regurgitation will not be included in this study. Implantation with the Contour 3D® or Tri-Ad® ring will occur in conjunction with another concomitant surgical repair procedure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject or legal guardian willing and able to sign and date the Informed Consent Form (and Authorization to Use and Disclose Health Information Form, if applicable)
- Subject indicated for a concomitant surgical repair of the TV
- Subject is willing to return for required follow-up visits to the hospital where the implantation originally occurred
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject with a degenerative TV condition
- Subject with primary TV regurgitation
- Subject with a previous TV repair or replacement
- Subject indicated for a stand-alone TV repair
- Subject currently participating in an investigational drug or another device study
- Subject with life expectancy of less than one year
- Subject is pregnant or desires to be pregnant within 12 months following implantation
- Subject is under 18 or over 85 years of age
- Subject with active endocarditis
- Subject with valvular retraction with severely reduced mobility
- Subject with a heavily calcified TV

facility.name: Florida Heart & Vascular Care at Aventura

group.description: The subject population includes patients indicated for a TV repair procedure concomitant to left-sided heart surgery, and for whom the surgeon considers the implantation of a Contour 3D® ring most appropriate to reconstruct the diseased valve. Patients with primary TV regurgitation will not be included in this study. Implantation with the Contour 3D® ring will occur in conjunction with another concomitant surgical repair procedure Contour 3D® implant for tricuspid valve repair: Tricuspid annuloplasty ring

group.title: Tri-Ad® Implant
group.description: The subject population includes patients indicated for a TV repair procedure concomitant to left-sided heart surgery, and for whom the surgeon considers the implantation of a Tri-Ad® ring most appropriate to reconstruct the diseased valve. measure.title: Change in the Degree of TV Leaflet Tethering Height
measure.description: The primary objective is the evaluation of hemodynamic performance of the TV postimplant of a tricuspid annuloplasty ring in a postmarket environment by analysis of the TV leaflet tethering height. Change in the degree of TV leaflet tethering height from pre-implant through 12 months post-implant

outcome.description: The secondary objective is the evaluation of effect of TV repair with the study ring on Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area at end diastole. Change in the Right ventricle (RV) diastolic area from preimplant through 12 months post-implant.

outcome.title: Demographic Data
outcome.description: Characterize the patient population for which an annuloplasty ring is chosen to repair TV insufficiency and assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status

outcome.title: Change in New York Heart Association (NYHA) Classification
outcome.description: Assess the effect of TV repair with the study ring on the tricuspid valve functional status by analysis of the New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification from pre-implant through 12 months post-implant.

reported_events.time_frame: Device or procedure related Adverse events (AEs) were collected from study enrollment to study closure, up to 1 year.
reported_events.desc: All new or worsening device or procedure related AEs were collected through1 year.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
